channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Twitter to impose daily limits on DMs for unverified accounts, citing an effort to ‘reduce spam’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Twitter has not yet specified what the daily DM limits will be, and the move hasn’t been received well by both verified and unverified users.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Binance slashes costs, Ripple ready for US banks and crypto VCs return
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz looks at Binance’s ongoing efforts to curb declining profits, Ripple’s expectation that U.S. banks may soon adopt XRP and the first signs of venture capital returning to crypto.

item.title: AI21 Labs debuts anti-hallucination feature for GPT chatbots
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Contextual Answers is designed for enterprise but could have far-reaching implications for the generative AI sector.

item.title: Centralized exchanges will become gateways for DeFi: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had a mixed week, with most of the tokens continuing to trade in a similar range as the previous week.

item.title: UK court grants appeal from Craig Wright in Bitcoin rights lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The decision reverses a prior ruling, allowing Craig Wright to appeal a lawsuit claiming copyright to the Bitcoin white paper and database.

item.title: Litecoin price at risk of a 30% drop if key LTC futures historical trend repeats
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: A multiyear review of Litecoin futures open interest reveals a unique trend that has significantly impacted the LTC price in the past.

item.title: Price analysis 7/21: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, ADA, SOL, DOGE, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Several Bitcoin price indicators suggest that BTC’s narrow trading range could end soon, resulting in a volatile price move in BTC and altcoins.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s brother planned to buy island and prep for apocalypse: court filing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to court documents, Gabriel Bankman-Fried wrote a memo to the FTX Foundation with a plan to build a bunker to survive “some event where 50%-99.99% of people die."

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: XRP price searches for a fresh bullish catalyst to trigger a move above $1
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.category: XRP trading volumes are still surging
but the token has yet to move out of a long-term resistance zone.
item.description: XRP’s price rallied in excess of 100% after Ripple’s victory last week, but do fundamentals support a move to $1 and beyond?

item.title: McDonald’s debuts McNuggets Land in The Sandbox
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: McDonald’s Hong Kong has picked The Sandbox to build its first Web3 experience, McNuggets Land.

item.title: Couple behind Bitfinex money laundering scheme reach plea deal with US prosecutors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Ilya Lichtenstein and Heather Morgan are scheduled to appear for an arraignment and hearing on Aug. 3 as part of a plea agreement with U.S. prosecutors.

item.title: Crypto VC funding tumbles as economic uncertainty scares off investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: June rejected the three-month trend of rising venture capital investment into crypto, though that’s not necessarily a bearish signal.

item.title: How do DeFi projects generate profit?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian J. Permal
item.description: If you don’t know where the yield is coming from, you are the yield. This week’s episode of Market Talks discusses how DeFi platforms generate a profit and if high yields are sustainable.

item.title: BlackRock ETF will be 'big rubber yes stamp' for Bitcoin: Interview with Charles Edwards
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin's future is overwhelmingly bright, and short-term price pressures should not distract investors from a future global asset class, says the Capriole Investments founder.

item.title: Bitcoin miners still bullish despite toughest bear market yet - Hut8, Foundry, Braiins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Bitcoin mining firms have been forced to sell newly minted Bitcoin to cover operational costs during one of the toughest bear markets for miners on record.

item.title: The last Bitcoin: What will happen once all BTC are mined?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: According to some experts, miners will always be essential to the Bitcoin ecosystem, even after mining the last coins.

item.title: Web3 Gamer: Earn Bitcoin in Minecraft, BGA’s 50/50 gender split, Oath of Peak hot take
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Erhan Kahraman
item.description: How to earn Bitcoin in Minecraft, Sega is half in/half out of blockchain games, BGA board’s 50/50 gender split, and more Web3 gaming news.

item.title: Binance CEO warns of phishing scams as Uniswap founder gets hacked
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The number of social engineering attacks in the cryptocurrency industry has been rising, with major execs getting hacked recently.

item.title: Curve omnipool platform Conic Finance hacked for $3.2M in ETH
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: According to initial analysis by Peckshield, the root cause for the hack was the new CurveLPOracleV2 contract.

item.title: 5 emerging digital finance trends to watch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore five emerging digital finance trends shaping the financial landscape in the digital age.

item.title: Cerebras Systems secures $100M AI supercomputer deal with UAE’s G42
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Alongside G42, Cerebras aims to expand the supercomputer, with plans to establish 36 exaflops of AI computing in the coming year.

item.title: US DoJ accuses FTX founder of leaking private diary of Caroline Ellison
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried attempted to publicly discredit government witness Caroline Ellison, who was once his business ally and a romantic partner, the DoJ argued.

item.title: Bitcoin Bollinger Bands echo move that ended in 40% January gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price should put in a “strong” reaction now that Bitcoin Bollinger Bands are at their most compact since the start of 2023.

item.title: Dota 2, Rocket League pros ‘want to explore’ Web3 and blockchain gaming
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Professional Dota 2 player Erik “Tofu” Engel believes that Web3 has very beneficial features for gamers.

item.title: US Justice Department to double its crypto team, target ransomware crimes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team, established in 2021, will be merged with the Computer Crime and Intellectual Property Section.

item.title: Bitcoin no longer asset of choice for criminals — former Elliptic crypto advisor
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Criminals have moved away from using Bitcoin for money laundering, with stablecoins emerging as an alternative due to accessibility.

item.title: Digital yuan integration introduced to Chinese business air travel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The Civil Aviation Administration and China Merchants Bank said passengers can utilize the central bank digital currency to access new services via this platform.

item.title: US state agency issues alert on crypto fraud happening over social media
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Vermont issued the investor alert after a 74-year-old man lost his life savings of over $340,000 in a crypto fraud orchestrated over Instagram and Telegram.

item.title: Indonesia launches its crypto exchange and clearing house
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The platform, monitored by local regulators, will be the only space in the country where the legal exchange of digital assets is allowed.
